VBox.Label: "Resetting the event removes all player characters and spawned"
"mobs from the Felucca T2A game area. DON'T DO THIS "
"UNLESS YOU DON'T CARE ABOUT OR HAVE ALREADY TABULTED"
"THE SCORES, AS THEY WILL BE LOST!"
"Starting the event will allow players to sign up"
"and send out a global sign-up gump."
"This saves the scores to a log file in the Logs/Uberscript folder"
